book_crud_service.service package¶

Submodules¶

book_crud_service.service.book_service module¶

class book_crud_service.service.book_service.BookService(session: AsyncSession)[source]¶

Bases: object

async create_book(book_data: BookCreateModel) → Book[source]¶

Create a new book in the repository. - book_data: Pydantic model (BookCreateModel) containing the book data.

async delete_book(book_id: int) → None[source]¶

Delete a book by its ID from the repository. - book_id: The ID of the book to delete.

async get_all_books() → List[Book][source]¶

Fetch all books from the repository.

async get_book_by_id(book_id: int) → Book | None[source]¶

Fetch a single book by its ID from the repository. - book_id: The ID of the book to retrieve.

async patch_book(book_id: int, book_data: BookPatchModel) → Book | None[source]¶

Partial update of a book in the repository. - book_id: The ID of the book to patch. - book_data: Pydantic model (BookPatchModel) containing the fields to be updated.

async update_book(book_id: int, book_data: BookUpdateModel) → Book | None[source]¶

Update an existing book in the repository. - book_id: The ID of the book to update. - book_data: Pydantic model (BookUpdateModel) containing the updated data.

class book_crud_service.service.review_service.ReviewService(session: AsyncSession)[source]¶

Bases: object

async create_review(book_id: int, review_data: ReviewCreateModel) → Review[source]¶

Create a new review in the repository. - book_id: The ID of the book associated with the review. - review_data: The Pydantic model (ReviewCreateModel) containing review data.
